EmailTemplate.subject: We're looking into your enquiry.

Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for contacting Australia Post.
We have received your enquiry: {!Case.Subject}
A case has been created and your Case Reference Number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
A member of our support team will be in touch shortly.
Australia Post will never send you an email asking for your password, credit card details or account information.
